task: Plan and execute a themed family reunion in New Zealand with a Hobbiton twist next summer. Secure permits for exclusive use of movie-based locations and arrange for themed catering, costumes, and live musicians. Organize international flights and accommodations, design personalized souvenirs, and ensure an immersive experience with masquerade elements. Additionally, coordinate group activities like guided tours and interactive workshops.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: The top-level client agent that communicates with the user and orchestrates the agents to complete the task.

agents.name: theme_design_agent
agents.role: Develops the overall thematic elements for the reunion, focusing on Hobbiton inspiration.

agents.name: event_location_agent
agents.role: Coordinates exclusive use of shooting locations in New Zealand for a Hobbiton-inspired family reunion.

agents.name: entertainment_management_agent
agents.role: Handles entertainment, including live music and performances, to align with the theme.

agents.name: catering_management_agent
agents.role: Oversees themed catering services, ensuring a gastronomic experience reflective of the event's mood.

agents.name: travel_and_accommodation_agent
agents.role: Arranges all travel logistics, including international flights and luxury accommodations.

agents.name: souvenir_design_agent
agents.role: Designs and oversees the production of personalized souvenirs for attendees.

agents.name: activity_coordination_agent
agents.role: Plans group activities including guided tours and workshops in the New Zealand locale.

agents.name: immersive_experience_agent
agents.role: Ensures an immersive event experience with elements of mystery and role-play.

agents.name: thematic_element_agent
agents.role: Focuses on the creation of thematic decorations and settings, enhancing the Hobbiton theme.

agents.name: costume_design_agent
agents.role: Designs costumes for attendees to enhance immersion in the theme.

agents.name: hobbiton_location_agent
agents.role: Finds and secures locations within Hobbiton for exclusive event use.

agents.name: permit_acquisition_agent
agents.role: Obtains necessary permits for the exclusive use of film locations.

agents.name: location_arrangement_agent
agents.role: Coordinates location arrangement and setup in Hobbiton.

agents.name: musicians_booking_agent
agents.role: Selects and secures live musicians familiar with folk themes.

agents.name: musician_contract_agent
agents.role: Manages contracts and agreements with booked musicians.

agents.name: live_music_experience_agent
agents.role: Ensures the musical performances create an authentic and engaging atmosphere.

agents.name: themed_menu_design_agent
agents.role: Designs a menu reflective of Middle-earth cuisine using local ingredients.

agents.name: gourmet_tasting_agent
agents.role: Facilitates tasting sessions to select the final event menu.

agents.name: final_menu_approval_agent
agents.role: Makes the final approval of the event menu after all tastings.

agents.name: international_flight_agent
agents.role: Coordinates flight booking for all international attendees.

agents.name: flight_detail_agent
agents.role: Provides detailed itineraries and flight confirmations.

agents.name: luxury_stay_agent
agents.role: Books luxury stays that fit within the thematic realm and budget.

agents.name: artisan_collaboration_agent
agents.role: Works with artisans to create unique, handcrafted souvenirs.

agents.name: customization_agent
agents.role: Customizes souvenirs to reflect personal and event-specific details.

agents.name: tour_organization_agent
agents.role: Plans and books guided tours, enhancing the Hobbiton experience.

agents.name: guided_experience_agent
agents.role: Manages experiences and tour guide assignments.

agents.name: workshop_finder_agent
agents.role: Finds workshops that explore local crafts and maker experiences.

agents.name: masquerade_design_agent
agents.role: Designs and coordinates masquerade activities, adding an element of mystery to the event.

agents.name: fabric_selection_agent
agents.role: Chooses fabric and materials appropriate for high-quality, theme-based costumes.

agents.name: supplier_management_agent
agents.role: Manages relationships with material suppliers to ensure timely delivery.

agents.name: contract_review_agent
agents.role: Reviews contracts for musician agreements and other services.

agents.name: dietary_review_agent
agents.role: Analyzes dietary needs and restrictions to ensure all guests' needs are met.

agents.name: travel_insurance_agent
agents.role: Secures travel insurance options for international travelers.

agents.name: distribution_management_agent
agents.role: Ensures the timely distribution of souvenirs to attendees.

agents.name: local_guides_agent
agents.role: Connects with local guides to offer personalized tour experiences.

agents.name: interactive_physics_implementation_agent
agents.role: Incorporates technology to create engaging, physics-based interactive displays.

tools.name: hobbiton_location_agent
tools.description: Finds and secures locations within Hobbiton for exclusive event use.

requirements.description: Specific requirements for the venue use

tools.name: souvenir_design_tool
tools.description: Generates designs for custom souvenirs based on user input.

attendee_names.description: List of attendee names for personalization
